GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.19.7
GSD.description:
HID: steam: Prevent NULL pointer dereference in steam_{recv,send}_report

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.7 by commit dee1e51b54794e90763e70a3c78f27ba4fa930ec, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit c164d6abf3841ffacfdb757c10616f9cb1f67276. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: steam: Prevent NULL pointer dereference in steam_{recv,send}_report
